article_title: PetSmart Lowers Full-Year Outlook, Sales Fall Short
article_text:
PetSmart Inc. cut its full-year outlook and said its fiscal first-quarter sales missed expectations, though the company's earnings for the quarter edged up 1.3%.

PetSmart shares slid more than 7% in premarket trading.

For the year, PetSmart now expects earnings of $4.29 to $4.39 a share and flat same-store sales growth, compared with its...
